title: I created a responsive Netflix clone with an attractive UI, dynamic banners, and a working form, showcasing my frontend development skills. 🚀
Thrilled to launch my E-Commerce Store with a stunning UI, smooth navigation, and a seamless experience! 🛍️💻 Showcasing my frontend skills with a modern, responsive design.🚀

I built a Movie Search Website using HTML, CSS, Bootstrap, and JavaScript with API integration to fetch real-time movie data. It features a dark-themed UI, responsive design, and instant movie search functionality for a smooth user experience! 🚀🎬
LinkUp is a Java-based communication app with a database for efficient user data management, offering posting, likes, comments, and password reset features. 💬📱
I recently built a PDF Merger Web App using Node.js and Express.js, a simple yet powerful tool that allows users to combine multiple PDFs into a single document within seconds.
I have created a Node.js script to bulk rename files on the desktop. It automatically replaces file names using the fs and path modules. 🚀
